
An intern reused a random number while signing two blockchain transactions. Can you recover the private key and uncover the flag in Sig1: c050c3f0b8d45b9e093a91cb96d097b24100e66585d0d8561e01c1231837493f80b29be9debd80ee16f80f02f4807687316866f9a429b5c133c911549572fa46
